text:
你可參照 Apple 支援服務的網上指南，在指導服務開始之前輕鬆將資料轉移至你的新 iPad。
隨你所需，隨時取閱逐步指引
如何轉移資料至你的新 iPad >
如何重設你的 Apple ID 密碼 >
透過 Apple 支援取得個人化協助服務
尋找解答，按照逐步指引解決疑難，更可與專人直接對話。
下載 Apple 支援 App >
瀏覽 Apple 支援服務 >
trans:
You can refer to Apple Support's online guide to easily transfer data to your new iPad before guidance service begins.
Get step-by-step guidance whenever you need it
How to transfer data to your new iPad >
How to reset your Apple ID password >
Get personalized assistance with Apple Support
Find answers, follow step-by-step instructions to solve your problems, and talk directly to a specialist.
Download the Apple Support App >
Browse Apple Support services >
